articles.title: Colombia tries quashing tensions at migrant camp with soccer
articles.description: Colombian officials are hoping to help ease tensions at a Venezuelan migrant camp with a game both new arrivals and their hosts share a passion for: soccer
articles.content: BOGOTA, Colombia Colombian officials are hoping to quash tensions at a Venezuelan migrant camp with a game both the new arrivals and their hosts share a passion for: soccer. Migrants faced off against Colombian aid workers in a tournament Wednesday, two days … [+2708 chars]

articles.title: Killing of Khashoggi tests U.S. defense industry as backlash builds on Capitol Hill
articles.description: Growing bipartisan support for legislation to curtail arms sales to Saudi Arabia marks a rare setback for one of the most influential lobbies in Washington.
